testcase.classname: feature to teast google search functionallty
testcase.name: Validate google search is working
Check login is successful with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters username and password......................................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user is navigated to the home page.....................................passed

testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credential
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome Browser............................................passed When User Opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login?ReturnUrl=%2Fadmin%2F".passed And User Enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And click on Login..........................................................passed Then Page Title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"..........passed When User click on Log out link.............................................passed Then Page Title should be "Your store. Login"...............................passed And Close Browser...........................................................passed
